### Compare annual CMD to annual ASMR

```{r}

# Set station name of interest
stnName="FORT ST JAMES"

X<-
  dat %>% 
  filter(stn_name%in%stnName) %>% 
  group_by(Year) %>% # group by year to create annual summaries
  summarise(CMD=sum(CMD),
            S1.ASMR=mean(S1.ASMR),
            S2.ASMR=mean(S2.ASMR),
            S3.ASMR=mean(S3.ASMR),
            S4.ASMR=mean(S4.ASMR),
            S5.ASMR=mean(S5.ASMR))
  
lm(CMD~S2.ASMR,data=X) %>% summary()

plot(S2.ASMR~CMD,data=X)
text(S2.ASMR ~CMD, labels=Year,data=X, cex=0.9, font=2)

```
